comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: I am sorry that you lost the money but doing any business with a newbie account that has no trade history could only end up this way. It won't help you, but maybe it will save another naive and inexperienced member like you.Here is the report format https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=260073.0

comments.author: Getmon
comments.body: Before making an accusation of fraud against someone, you need to provide specific evidence. Since making a comment on your marketplace topic, Betfair23 has gone offline. I am sorry you lost your money. It is unfortunate that another member is victimized. You have been a member of bitcointalk since 2018, it is difficult for me to comprehend how you could trust a novice account with no value or reputation. In just a few minutes, low-ranked accounts with no value can be easily created. You probably already heard about escrows in bitcointalk. Some members may not be using escrow because of small deals, but $400, as you pointed out, is not a small sum.
